p: A recent evaluation of VL and TCD4 count was analyzed only in groups exposed to HIV. Both data were subdivided into three categories for better analysis. Viral load (VL) were categorized into ≤10,000, 10,001 to 100,000, >100,000 HIV/mL ribonucleic acid (RNA). VL ≤10,000 HIV/mL was classified as undetectable.
